thread.title: Run for the Paws in Mundelein to benefit charity
thread.title_full: Run for the Paws in Mundelein to benefit charity

author: Daily Herald report
title: Run for the Paws in Mundelein to benefit charity
text:
The Mundelein High School PE Leadership program will host a Run for the Paws relay race fundraiser Sunday, Oct. 25. It will begin at 3 p.m. at the school stadium, 1350 W. Hawley St. Proceeds will benefit Reach Rescue in Mundelein and the Crohn's and Colitis Foundation of America. The race is open to sixth-graders or anyone older. Younger kids can participate in supervised activities, for a $5 fee. Participation costs $60 per six-person relay team. Registration forms are available in the school's front office, in the school bookstore or from advisers Nancy Toland or Justin Hart.
 News Charities and Fundraising Mundelein High School
